name: Pyroclasm Pulse
description: A violent eruption of compressed flame.

name: Fulgur Spear

description: Stone shards erupt upward, tearing through foes.

name: Rotting Deluge

name: Cinder Lance
description: A focused jet of superheated ash.

ability.description: Channel a 520-length beam of molten ash for 1.2 seconds, dealing 34 fire damage to all enemies touched.

name: Static Bloom
description: Electricity detonates outward from a single point.

ability.description: Detonate a burst of electricity in a 150-radius area, dealing 28 lightning damage and applying Shocked for 2 seconds.

name: Black Gale
description: A violent wind infused with void energy.

ability.description: Summon a dark storm with a 180-radius that lasts 3 seconds, dealing 10 shadow damage per second to enemies inside.

name: Radiant Shatter
description: Light fractures violently on impact.

ability.description: Launch a radiant stone projectile that deals 36 light damage on impact.

name: Storm Ripper
description: Lightning tears through the air in curved paths.

ability.description: Fire 3 spreading lightning bolts that each deal 18 lightning damage to enemies hit.

name: Mire Collapse
description: The ground liquefies and crushes inward.

ability.description: Collapse a muddy zone in a 170-radius area, dealing 31 earth damage and slowing enemies for 3 seconds.

name: Void Scorch
description: Shadowflame burns without light.

ability.description: Channel a shadowflame beam for 1.3 seconds that deals 29 fire damage and applies Burning for 5 seconds.

name: Venom Cyclone
description: Toxic winds spiral violently.

ability.description: Create a toxic cyclone with a 160-radius that lasts 4 seconds, dealing 7 poison damage per second.

name: Solar Impact
description: A concentrated burst of solar fire.

ability.description: Launch a solar projectile that explodes on impact, dealing 38 fire damage.

name: Cull the Weak
description: A precise strike that punishes injured enemies.

ability.description: Fire a projectile (speed 520) that deals 22 shadow damage, and if the target is below 40% health deal an additional 30 shadow damage. Cooldown: 3.2s.

name: Overload Arc
description: Lightning detonates violently on already shocked targets.

ability.description: Fire a projectile (speed 640) dealing 20 lightning damage. If the target is shocked, trigger an explosion in a 140-radius area dealing 28 fire damage. Cooldown: 3.6s.

name: Hemorrhage Strike
description: A brutal slash that escalates on bleeding enemies.

ability.description: Slash enemies in a 120 arc (range 2.2), dealing 24 shadow damage, and if the target is bleeding deal an additional 18 shadow damage. Cooldown: 2.4s.

name: Frostbite Detonation
description: Ice shatters violently when fully frozen.

ability.description: Fire an ice projectile (speed 480) dealing 16 water damage. If the target is frozen, trigger an explosion in a 150-radius area dealing 32 water damage. Cooldown: 3.8s.

name: Venom Cascade
description: Poison erupts outward once stacks reach critical mass.

ability.description: Fire a projectile (speed 500) dealing 14 poison damage and applying Poisoned for 5s. If the target has 4 or more poison stacks, create a 160-radius area for 3s dealing 7 poison damage per second. Cooldown: 3.4s.

name: Judgment Pulse
description: Light intensifies against corrupted enemies.

ability.description: Release a pulse in a 150-radius area dealing 26 light damage, and if enemies are burning deal an additional 22 fire damage. Cooldown: 3.0s.

name: Gravity Rupture
description: Crushing force intensifies at close range.

ability.description: Crush enemies in a 180-radius area dealing 20 earth damage, and if enemies are within 90 units deal an additional 20 shadow damage. Cooldown: 3.5s.

name: Chain Execution
description: Kills empower the lightning to leap again.

ability.description: Fire a projectile (speed 620) dealing 28 lightning damage. If the target dies, chain lightning to up to 2 nearby enemies within 200, dealing 30 lightning damage each. Cooldown: 4.2s.

name: Infernal Payback
description: Fire erupts more violently after taking damage.

ability.description: Explode in a 160-radius area dealing 24 fire damage, and if the caster took damage in the last 2 seconds deal an additional 18 fire damage. Cooldown: 3.1s.
